node.name: paco
node.text: Hey there, traveler. Who are you and what brings you here?

choice.option: My name is %%x. I'm just seeking out new adventures.

node.text: Ah, I see. Well, I do have a quest for you if you're interested. There's a dangerous beast lurking around here, and it's been attacking my livestock. Would you be willing to hunt it down for me?

choice.option: Sounds dangerous, but I'm up for the challenge. Do you have any information?
I don't think I'm ready for something like that yet.

node.text: It tends to roam around the nearby forest at night but I have no clue about its weak points.

choice.option: Thanks for the information. Anything else I should know?

node.text: Well, I can offer you 100 gold coins.
That's understandable. It's not for everyone. Have a safe journey ahead!
Good luck out there, and be careful!

choice.option: Of course! I'll do my best to take care of that beast.

node.text: There have been rumors that the beast is being controlled by someone. If that's true, you'll need to be extra cautious.

choice.option: Got it. I'll keep my guard up. I'll be on my way now.

node.text: End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: The fair is big %%x. Go around and discover the place, now everything will be closed, but surely there are people you can talk to.

choice.option: There are oracles everywhere. What is the deal with that?
Is there somewhere to train my abilities?

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: Enjoy this place, don't be so serious, nobody likes serious magicians. I recommend the House of Terrors, there is a very nice man at the door.

choice.option: I will greet him from you.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: How this place. This is the best fair in the world. They all have unique powers to cheer people up, or smash the faces of little busybodies. They can be a bit aggressive, but they are nice, sometimes.

choice.option: Busybodies... Like me you would say.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: Ooh! The Showman. He is a sweetheart! Always thinking of others, specifically their souls Isn't that sweet? He's the one keeping this alive, and with magic. Never forget, he is a powerful man, you don't want to make enmity with him. Although as adorable as he is, I don't think you'll be able to anger him.

choice.option: So he gave me my powers in exchange for my soul. He smells a rat.
I bet I can anger him.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: That's so exciting! There are attractions of all kinds. A house of terror that becomes the house of mirrors, a carousel, a Ferris wheel, the circus where the Showman lives and much more. You will surely have a great time. You will see! You will see! You will see!

choice.option: Yeah well... I can't wait to see that...

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: Well, maybe they do. Just in case, go practicing your powers.

choice.option: Either way, I won't be surprised.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: That is my favorite person, machine, thing... whatever. Look, you pay him and then he talks to you, isn't that awesome? I love it.

choice.option: I really do not understand you.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: He has an irascible character, it is so fun to talk to him. He has these clever answers. I dare you to anger him, if you do so I will give you some rewards. I am sure you will like it.

node.name: NIKITA
node.text: Indeed! We have the training tent just next to the stores. Go there if you want to practice.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: If there is something you want to know, toss a coin to see what's wrong.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: Another stupid boy to make me rich. I got a lot of knowledge from the dungeon you are about to go. Toss another coin if that is what you want.

choice.option: You just colled me stupid. Fuck off.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: You should pay me just to be talking to you, idiot. I offer information from the future, maybe you are not even able to read my name. I can tell you what you will find when you enter here, or if you have a special question, I can answer it for a coin, always for a coin.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: How dare you. I am always helpful. Always! Now the fee goes up to two coins you cocky jerk.

choice.option: You can mess with me, but you're just junk to me.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: I can't believe my eyes, you just paid, silly-billy. This is the worldwide famous House Of Terrors. I know just what you want, get information or reduce everything to ashes, you will never get it, this House Of Terror is not for everyone. If you want to toss one more coin...

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: You really think you'll make it huh. I have never seen anyone so foolish and useless in my entire life. Well... now that you've paid, I'll tell you one more thing, the house of terror is guarded by a ghostly entity that controls the lights, it doesn't speak so you won't be able to get much spark out of it. Now go and die, don't waste my time.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: Junk?! I'm not junk, idiot. I offer information from the future, maybe you are not even able to read my name. I can tell you what you will find when you enter here, or if you have a special question, I can answer it for coins, always for coins. The fee goes up again for you.

choice.option: That acrobat was right, this is a lot of fun. See you jerk.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: I got a special mission for you bod, go fuck yourself.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: IGOR AND IVAN
node.text: Hello mate. How can we help you?

choice.option: Tell me about the House Of Terrors.
Please heal the team, we are in trouble.

node.name: IGOR
node.text: I do not want to talk about that place.

node.name: IVAN
node.text: I will. That is an awful place. Scary. Creepy. Terrifying.

node.name: IGOR
node.text: You idiot. He already knows that. The House Of Terrors is a jail.

node.name: IVAN
node.text: Yes! A jail. They kept our friend locked. He is still there actually.

node.name: IGOR
node.text: You want to get free, right? News travels fast around here. Well you will have to defeat The House Of Terrors first.

node.name: IVAN
node.text: Save our friend! He is a nice smith, and a fighter.

node.name: IGOR
node.text: The best I would say. I'm sure it will help you if you save him.

node.name: IVAN
node.text: And maybe we give you some thanks.

node.name: IGOR AND IVAN
node.text: Save our friend and we will reward you.

node.name: IGOR AND IVAN
node.text: Here you have. Go smash them all!

node.name: IGOR AND IVAN
node.text: End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: Now I'm bound to you. How can I help?

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: It's nothing, it's just that since they locked me up I haven't seen my little brother.

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: They forced me to burn animals that do not mutate, and I refused. Thanks to you, now I can take revenge and help you take down the Beast Tent.

choice.option: Do you know what can we find there?

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: Wolf-goats, wasps, strange sea creatures and worst of all, the tamer. With her fire whip… not even me could beat her.

choice.option: Doesn't seem much harder than the last one.

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: Do not rely, we have to be proactive if we want to get out of here.

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: My brother was a very naughty boy, after the death of our parents we were left alone and found this place. The Showman hired us without hesitation. He turned me into what you see and said I had a special spark.

choice.option: And what happened to your bother?

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: My brother, on the other hand, was turned into a little devil, after 5 years, he hasn't grown an inch. He gave him the gift of strength, he told him that a naughty boy has to be strong enough to survive and named him D'yavol. I can't even remember his name before that.

choice.option: I'm sorry to hear that. Who knows, maybe one day he find him again.

node.name: YUROSLAVA
node.text: I wish. He is the strongest in the fair, he would help us a lot. I miss him.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: If there is something you want to know, toss a coin to see what's wrong.

choice.option: I feel we had this conversation already.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: Another stupid boy to make me rich. I got a lot of knowledge from the dungeon you are about to go. Toss another coin if that is what you want.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: Don't tell me! Well brat... then you know you have to pay. Toss a coin to know what I know.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: You must know, little vermin, that the animals in the Beast Tent have no compassion, they will kill you so quickly that you won't even have time to cry. Except the chickens, they may help you... If you get to them. Toss a coin to know even more.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: By golly, a rich brat is going to pass me his fortune. Well, I have bad news, they won't let me tell you anything else. Looks like you've surprised someone... Though not for long, you'll surely serve as food for the beasts inside.

node.name: ORACLE
node.text: I'll say no more. They are waiting for you.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Insensate...

choice.option: And a dwarf riding a bear tells me...

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: HOW? It's not possible! I am the one and only, the invincible, the immortal. I am General OBSHCHIY! I take care of the wildest attractions, I am the Showman's right hand.

choice.option: Then you must know how to get out of here.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: You fool...

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: As I said before, you are a fool. You can not -get out of here-. You are bond to this place, your soul is now the Showman's.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: He is the master. He is the most powerful devil on earth an beyond, and you made a trade with him without knowing. I can't believe my eyes...

choice.option: And what if I kill him?
What does he earn from me?

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Kill him? HA! You're just a little boy wanting to be a magician, and you think you can kill the master? Fool. Fool. Fool.

choice.option: That does not answer my question...

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Bah. You are exhausting, did you know that? Well, I guess, on the off chance that you could kill him, yes, the contract you signed would be broken and you would be free or whatever you call your life before this.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Well... I've never considered it. I guess he gets more power, or he just wants to surprise people with our amazing shows. Yes, I think it's more the second option.

choice.option: Shows to whom? I haven't seen anyone yet.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: They'll be here soon, we've only been in town for a few hours. Who knows, this might be our lucky week and lots and lots of viewers will come.

choice.option: Some hours? You've been here for over a week.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Well, that is something. Are you sure? Honestly, I don't remember the first day I got here. Anyone does. Some even goes mad, you will meet them, I'm sure.

choice.option: Yeah... that tells me a lot about you.

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: How dwarf, Medved did you hear that? I think this little weirdo wants trouble.

choice.option: If fighting against you guarantees me freedom...

node.name: OBSHCHIY
node.text: Oh no, we have a new comedian in the circus, how come they dressed a comedian so fancy? It's funny huh. Look kid, freedom is overrated, trust me, you don't want to leave this place. No matter how crazy people are, right Medved?

choice.option: Whatever. Have fun with your Medved.

node.text: End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: Hola! Te gustan mis pasos de baile?

node.name: PINKY
node.text: Quieres ver mis punetazos a ver si te gustan mas?

node.name: PINKY
node.text: Gracias! Quieres unirte? :D
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: No soy un furro, soy un DRAGON.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: Cada tres ataques hace pum y explotan cosas.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: ¡MILAGRO!
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: ¡Es que no me escuchais! >:(
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: No estoy delirando ¡Hay un viejo en Qatar!
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: PINKY
node.text: El demonio tiene la cola muy larga.
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: NOTE 1
node.text: Guess how many sleigh bells does the puppet have to know the first number of the sequences
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: NOTE 2
node.text: In the mirror it is found, count the knives to get the second number of the sequences
End of conversation -F1- to talk again

node.name: NOTE 3
node.text: It has this creepy look, the closet scratched by how many claws? that will be the third and last
End of conversation -F1- to talk again
